content: @Kim Morrison I've opened a Mathlib PR that bumps the version of Batteries.
This is unnecessary. If no changes are required, a bot automatically bumps the Batteries dependency every few hours.

Kim Morrison said:

This is unnecessary. If no changes are required, a bot automatically bumps the Batteries dependency every few hours.

I was just about to write a message that #12540 needs this bump, but you've already merged it! Thanks for your quick response.
